fact.description: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in for France at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a France throw-in in Honduras's half.
Honduras to take a throw-in in France territory.
Jerry Bengtson for Honduras is whistled offside.
Ball safe as Honduras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a free kick to Honduras in their own half.
Honduras's Jerry Bengtson is whistled for offside at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Antoine Griezmann (France) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Honduras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Porto Alegre to check on Patrice Evra, who is grimacing with pain.
The match at Estadio Beira-Rio is underway again.
Patrice Evra is back on his feet again.
Patrice Evra (France) has received a first yellow card.
Can France capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
France surge into the attack at Estadio Beira-Rio but Karim Benzema’s header is off-target.
Sandro Meira Ricci awards Honduras a goal kick.
Free kick France.
Throw-in for France in their own half.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a free kick to France.
Blaise Matuidi (France) gets in a shot – but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
Throw-in for France close to the penalty box.
France have been awarded a corner by Sandro Meira Ricci.
France's Mathieu Valbuena gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Honduras defender.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a free kick to France.
Honduras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Attention is being given to Honduras’s Victor Bernardez and play has been suspended briefly.
Play has been resumed.
Victor Bernardez returns to the field for Honduras after picking up a slight injury.
Can France get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Honduras's half?
Honduras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Honduras goal kick.
France's Yohan Cabaye misses with an attempt on goal.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a free kick to Honduras in their own half.
France apply pressure and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Antoine Griezmann. But the ball crashes against the crossbar!
Karim Benzema (France) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Honduras at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Wilson Palacios is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
France's Paul Pogba has been booked in Porto Alegre.
Wilson Palacios for Honduras has been booked by Sandro Meira Ricci and receives a first yellow card.
The match is underway again.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a free kick to Honduras in their own half.
Wilson Palacios for Honduras is back on the field again.
Can Honduras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in France's half?
Honduras have a dangerous throw-in.
Can France capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Honduras's half?
Honduras have a goal kick.
Throw-in Honduras.
Ball goes out of play for a France goal kick.
France to take a throw-in in Honduras territory.
Free kick France.
Honduras are coming forward and Maynor Figueroa gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Sandro Meira Ricci awards France a goal kick.
Throw-in for France at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Corner awarded to France.
Honduras have a goal kick.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a Honduras throw-in in France's half.
Throw-in France.
The match at Estadio Beira-Rio has been interrupted briefly for a check on Victor Bernardez, who is down injured.
Play is underway once more.
Corner awarded to France.
Penalty! Sandro Meira Ricci points to the spot, great chance for France...
At Estadio Beira-Rio, Wilson Palacios has been booked for the second time in this match. An early shower is now waiting!
Victor Bernardez has recovered and rejoins the match in Porto Alegre.
Goal! Karim Benzema gives France the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 1-0.
Honduras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mathieu Valbuena of France smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Ball safe as Honduras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the first half.
Free kick Honduras.
Yohan Cabaye (France) gets a yellow card.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a France throw-in in Honduras's half.
Free kick in a good position for France!
The first-half has come to a close in Porto Alegre.
Osman Chavez is on a sub for Victor Bernardez for Honduras.
Boniek Garcia is replacing Jerry Bengtson for Honduras at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Can France get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Honduras's half?
Goal! France extend their lead to 2-0 through Noel Valladares.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a free kick to Honduras.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a free kick to France in their own half.
Honduras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a free kick to France in their own half.
Boniek Garcia (Honduras) has received a yellow card from Sandro Meira Ricci.
Mathieu Valbuena (France) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Karim Benzema for France drives towards goal at Estadio Beira-Rio. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Mathieu Valbuena of France gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Honduras at Estadio Beira-Rio.
France make their first substitution with Moussa Sissoko replacing Paul Pogba.
Honduras make their third substitution with Jorge Claros replacing Andy Najar.
France have been awarded a corner by Sandro Meira Ricci.
In Porto Alegre France's Mathieu Valbuena is caught offside.
France to take a throw-in in Honduras territory.
Honduras have a goal kick.
France awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yohan Cabaye for France gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Honduras goal kick.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a free kick to France in their own half.
France awarded a throw-in in their own half.
France are pushing forward but Blaise Matuidi's finish is wide of the goal.
Sandro Meira Ricci awards Honduras a goal kick.
Honduras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for France in their own half.
Antonio Mavuba is on a sub for Yohan Cabaye for France.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a Honduras throw-in in France's half.
Corner awarded to France.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a free kick to Honduras in their own half.
In Porto Alegre Honduras drive forward through Boniek Garcia. His shot is on target but it's saved.
France have been awarded a corner by Sandro Meira Ricci.
Can Honduras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in France's half?
Honduras will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from France.
Great finish from Karim Benzema to give France a 3-0 lead.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Patrice Evra.
Sandro Meira Ricci has blown to resume play in Porto Alegre.
France’s Patrice Evra is on his feet again at Estadio Beira-Rio.
In Porto Alegre Honduras attack through Brayan Beckeles. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for France at Estadio Beira-Rio.
France have been awarded a corner by Sandro Meira Ricci.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a throw-in for France, close to Honduras's area.
Ball safe as Honduras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Honduras at Estadio Beira-Rio.
France make their third substitution with Olivier Giroud replacing Mathieu Valbuena.
Honduras to take a throw-in in France territory.
Throw-in for France in their own half.
Goal kick for Honduras at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Throw-in France.
Free kick France.
Luis Garrido for Honduras has been booked by Sandro Meira Ricci and receives a first yellow card.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a France throw-in in Honduras's half.
Karim Benzema (France) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to France.
The match in Porto Alegre is underway once more.
Honduras's Osman Chavez looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Osman Chavez for Honduras who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
France to take a throw-in in Honduras territory.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a free kick to France.
Honduras needs to be cautious. France have an attacking throw-in.
3 minutes will be added to the second half in Porto Alegre.
Honduras awarded a free kick in their own half.
France awarded a throw-in in their own half.
France are pushing forward but Blaise Matuidi's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Honduras goal kick.
Free kick Honduras.
Honduras have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for France at Estadio Beira-Rio.
The match is over. Final score 3-0.
